WorkItem.Description:
Environment:
===============
  1.       Win 2k3 or XP X86 DEU
        2.     SQL Server 10.0.1600.22
        3.     SQL Samples 090306
 
Repro Steps:
===============
1.  Run the SQL2008.AdventureWorks_All_Databases.x86.msi.
2.  Do every step by default until installation completed. 
3.  Check the user Views of AdventureWorksDW.
 
Expectation:
===============
There should be 6 user views in  AdventureWorksDW.
 
Actual Result:
===============
There is no user view in AdventureWorksDW.
Please view the attached file DBinstall.log.
WorkItem.Summary: Installer:  There is no user view in  AdventureWorksDW DB on x86 GRE.

Comments.Message: I've allready reported the same problem at the end of 2008. Unfortunately I didn't get a qualified answer and by now the issue seems to be removed - I can't find it anymore...

It only reproduce on  DEU environment: OS(DEU) + Katmai(DEU)
 
Verified on latest Sample Build 90828, still repro
